Description: Lip and wall sherd of Attic black-glazed pottery cup, type C; low concave lip with a sharp re-entrant curve on interior; glazed black inside and out (partly peeled); inscription cut on exterior of rim.
Curator's comments: Cups type C are attested before 510BC in destruction levels at Sybaris, see E. Greco, 'Sullo σχῆμα di Thurii: venti anni di ricerche con Silvana Luppino', Annuario della Scuola archeologica di Atene e delle Missioni italiane in Oriente XCII (Serie III, 14) (2014) [2016], 1-11, esp. 5.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXII, no. 89)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 647, no. 51)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1448)
